description: You have no right to submit a bid unless you are part of a pre-qualified supplier already included under contract
full_summary:
## Acquisition of Laboratory/Pharmaceutical Stand-Up Freezers

### Notice Details

* **Reference Number:** CB-629-3102302
* **Amendment Number:** 8
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000254012
* **Publication Date:** November 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 9, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

### Tender Description

The Public Health Agency of Canada invites Suppliers who are currently pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI to submit bids for the acquisition of Laboratory/Pharmaceutical Stand-Up Freezers. This request is reserved for Suppliers who have a current Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.

### Key Details

* **Delivery Location:** Ottawa, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Public Health Agency of Canada
* **End User Entities Name:** National Emergency Strategic Stockpile of The Emergency Management Branch

### Selection Criteria

The procurement will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Cathrina Estephan-Saliba
* **Email:** cathrina.estephan-saliba@hc.sc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (613) 293-4847

### Document Attachments

* Tender notice: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/24529/npp\_1000254012.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/24529/npp\_1000254012.pdf)
* Amendment 1: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/24529/amd\_01\_npp\_1000254012.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/24529/amd\_01\_npp\_1000254012.pdf)

### Important Notes

Only pre-qualified Suppliers on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI may submit bids. Suppliers that are not pre-qualified on this Supply Arrangement will not have their bids evaluated. Suppliers may qualify for this Supply Arrangement at
